author: CBC News
title: CBC goes inside Toronto hospital to show the fight against COVID-19
description: Humber River Hospital in Toronto, Ont. opened its doors to allow CBC News rare access to observe a day in the life of the hospital, in the midst of a global pandemic.
content:
You've likely seen the videos on social media: exhausted doctors and nurses pleading with the public to stay inside, to limit the spread of COVID-19 and avoid overwhelming hospitals. 
But what is it really like inside hospitals in Canada right now? One of th… [+1706 chars]
